actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To amend the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act to clarify that judgements in actions brought under the Act are enforceable in any court of competent jurisdiction.
short_title: Fair Debt Collection Practices Act Amendments of 2000

summary.text: Fair Debt Collection Practices Act Amendments of 2000 - Amends the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act to provide that the venue restrictions controlling legal actions brought by debt collectors for a consumer debt do not apply to any judgment enforcement proceeding in a court of competent jurisdiction (thus making judgments enforceable in any such court).

titles.title: Fair Debt Collection Practices Act Amendments of 2000
To amend the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act to clarify that judgements in actions brought under the Act are enforceable in any court of competent jurisdiction.
